trans-unit.source: Determines whether an assembly belongs to a code group by testing its global assembly cache membership.
trans-unit.target: 藉由測試組件的全域組件快取成員資格，決定組件是否屬於程式碼群組。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: All assemblies installed in the global assembly cache are granted the `FullTrust` permission set.
trans-unit.target: 授與所有組件安裝在全域組件快取`FullTrust`權限集合。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Code satisfies this membership condition if it is installed in the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼符合這個成員資格條件，如果已安裝在全域組件快取中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition> class topic.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition>類別主題。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Evidence" /> against which to make the test.
trans-unit.target: 要進行測試的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Evidence" />。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified evidence satisfies the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 指示指定的辨識項是否符合成員資格條件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified evidence satisfies the membership condition; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的辨識項符合成員資格條件，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This membership condition tests <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacInstalled> evidence.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員資格條件會測試<xref:System.Security.Policy.GacInstalled>辨識項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition.Check%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition.Check%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition>類別。

trans-unit.source: Creates an equivalent copy of the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 建立成員資格條件的相等複本。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A copy of a membership condition is identical to the original membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 成員資格條件的副本與原始的成員資格條件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition.Copy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition.Copy%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition>類別。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current object.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前物件比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current object is equivalent to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 表示目前的物件是否相當於指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="o" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="o" /> 是 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: There are no degrees of global assembly cache membership.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何程度的全域組件快取成員資格。

trans-unit.source: An assembly is either in the cache or it is not.
trans-unit.target: 組件快取中或不是。

trans-unit.source: If the object identified by `o` is a <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition>, then the objects being compared are equal.
trans-unit.target: 如果所識別的物件`o`是<xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition>，然後進行比較的物件是否相等。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `false` only if `o` is `null` or if `o` is not a <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回`false`才`o`是`null`或`o`不<xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition.Equals%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition>類別。

trans-unit.source: Uses the specified XML encoding to reconstruct a security object.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 XML 編碼，重建安全性物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.SecurityElement" /> that contains the XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.SecurityElement" />，包含用來重建安全性物件的 XML 編碼。

trans-unit.source: Uses the specified XML encoding to reconstruct a security object.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 XML 編碼，重建安全性物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition.FromXml%2A> method reconstructs a <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition> from an XML encoding defined by the <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition.FromXml%2A>方法重建<xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition>從所定義的 XML 編碼方式<xref:System.Security.SecurityElement>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition.ToXml%2A> method to XML-encode the <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition> including state information.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition.ToXml%2A>方法，將 XML 編碼<xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition>包含狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition.FromXml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition.FromXml%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition>類別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> is not a valid membership condition element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> 不是有效的成員資格條件項目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.SecurityElement" /> that contains the XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.SecurityElement" />，包含用來重建安全性物件的 XML 編碼。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel" /> context for resolving <see cref="T:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet" /> references.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel" /> 內容，用於解析 <see cref="T:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet" /> 參考。

trans-unit.source: Uses the specified XML encoding to reconstruct a security object, using the specified policy level context.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 XML 編碼，以指定的原則層級內容重建安全性物件。

trans-unit.source: The policy level context is provided for resolution of named permission set references.
trans-unit.target: 原則層級內容提供解析具名使用權限集合的參考。

trans-unit.source: For example, code groups use policy level to find named permission sets.
trans-unit.target: 例如，程式碼群組會使用原則層級來尋找具名使用權限集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition.FromXml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition.FromXml%2A>方法。

trans-unit.target: 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition>類別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> is not a valid membership condition element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> 不是有效的成員資格條件項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets a hash code for the current membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前成員資格條件的雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: 0 (zero).

The <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition.GetHashCode%2A> method returns 0 (zero) because <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition> objects have no properties to distinguish one from another.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition.GetHashCode%2A>方法會傳回 0 （零），因為<xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition>物件沒有任何屬性，以區別自另一個。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition.GetHashCode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition.GetHashCode%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition>類別。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 傳回成員資格條件的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 成員資格條件的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The string representation for <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition> is "GAC".
trans-unit.target: 字串表示式<xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition>是"GAC"。

trans-unit.target: 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition>類別。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.
trans-unit.target: 建立安全物件及其目前狀態的 XML 編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.
trans-unit.target: 建立安全物件及其目前狀態的 XML 編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.SecurityElement" /> that contains the XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.SecurityElement" />，包含安全性物件的 XML 編碼，含任何狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition.FromXml%2A> method to restore the state information from a <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition.FromXml%2A>方法，以還原狀態資訊從<xref:System.Security.SecurityElement>。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state, using the specified policy level context.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的原則層級內容，建立安全性物件的 XML 編碼和它的目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.SecurityElement" /> that contains the XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.SecurityElement" />，包含安全性物件的 XML 編碼，含任何狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: The policy level context is provided for resolution of named permission set references.
trans-unit.target: 原則層級內容提供解析具名使用權限集合的參考。

trans-unit.source: For example, code groups use policy level to find named permission sets.
trans-unit.target: 例如，程式碼群組會使用原則層級來尋找具名使用權限集合。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Security.Policy.GacMembershipCondition.ToXml%2A>方法。
